overview: There is a well-known author who has won numerous accolades for each of his works. He was revered and looked up to by everyone. They were unaware that this author's success was concealed by a dark secret.  In order to write a story, Arman, the author, consumes human blood. He must murder a person and drink their blood in order to accomplish it. Every time he drinks it, he gains the ability to have a glimpse into the life of each victim, and by doing so, he is given the power and inspiration to create a story.  Since he began writing, he has become dependent on and obsessed with this. He is nothing, he is empty, and he won't be able to create a story without these deeds.
title: Panganti
